retrotrivia/retrotrivia.name: 復古瑣事
retrotrivia/retrotrivia.original_desc:
Retrotrivia is a fun way to explore your Batocera games library. Guess which game thumbnail video is played, with effects like pixelization, rotation, or zoom, and answer 210+ handcrafted quiz and trivia questions on the retrogaming culture.

Compete with your friends! Up to 4 players can play together.
retrotrivia/retrotrivia.desc:
Retrotrivia 是探索 Batocera 遊戲庫的有趣方式。猜猜正在玩哪個遊戲縮略圖視頻，並使用像素化、旋轉或縮放等效果，並回答 210 多個有關復古遊戲文化的手工測驗和瑣事問題。

與你的朋友競爭！最多 4 名玩家可以一起玩。
